description:
With over 7 million guys in 192 countries, Grindr finds guys close to you for chatting and meeting anywhere in the world. Find your perfect guy right now.

Grindr - the world’s leading mobile social network app exclusively for gay, bi and curious men - is sexier and faster than ever.

Download today and get started with these great features:

•Customize your search to find your ideal man
•Choose a “Tribe” to declare your own sexy type, including Bear, Twink, Jock, and others
•View up to 100 guys
•Save guys as favorites and block others
•Chat, swap photos, and let guys know where you are

Grindr is free and available for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch. With more than 300,000 guys online right now, gay chatting, gay dating and playing are only a few taps away.

Note: Only adults 18 years or older are allowed to use Grindr.
trackCensoredName: Grindr - Gay, same sex, bi, social network to chat and meet guys
trackName: Grindr - Gay, same sex, bi, social network to chat and meet guys
releaseNotes:
Hey guys - Grindr here with a update with some fixes. Here’s what’s new: 

+ Fixed a bug where changing your password can sometimes prevent guys from showing
+ Fixed a bug where submitting a support ticket could sometimes fail to send
+ Fixed a bug sometimes causing the keyboard to get stuck in iOS 8
+ Fixed a bug where photos would sometimes fail to send on iPad
+ Fixed a bug where pressing ‘done’ wouldn’t save edits to your profile
+ General maintenance and performance 

If you have any issues with the app, please contact support by tapping 'Help' in the side menu.
